solution.sample:
Овен -  Aries 
	Телец  - Taurus
	Близнецы  - Gemini
	Рак - Cancer
	Лев - Lion
	Дева- Virgo
	Весы- Libra
	Скорпион - Scorpius
	Стрелец - Sagittarius
	Козерог- Capricorn
	Водолей  - Aquarius
	Рыбы - Pisces

ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
taskDescription:
Machine translation may be a shortcut to languages you do not know (yet). Try it out for unknown languages!

 

  1. Write your astrological sign in a machine transator and translate it into Russian [or any other unknown language for you that your are curious about].
  2. Copy this translation in an image searcher to check of the translation is correct.
  3. If you like calligraphy, hand write your astrological sign in Russian and get some practice with Russian calligraphy!
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.
ariaRetry: Retry the task. You can improve your previous answer if the author allowed that.
